Amazon has slashed prices on Apple's M4 MacBook Air further, with the Sky Blue 13-inch laptop falling to $837.

The 16% markdown at Amazon delivers a new record low price on the 13-inch MacBook Air M4 in Sky Blue, with the laptop falling to $837.19.

Buy M4 Air for $837

These thin-and-light notebooks come equipped with Apple's M4 chip with an 8-core GPU. They also have 16GB of unified memory and 256GB of storage. If you're looking for extra storage or RAM, though, you can save $150 to $162 on the higher-end retail models as well at Amazon.

Today's best MacBook Air deals

  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $837.19 ($162 off) at Amazon, $849 at B&H
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,049 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,237.19 ($162 off) at Amazon, $1,249 at B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $1,049 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,249 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) in Starlight: $1,432 ($167 off) at Amazon

We previously covered Amazon's $849 13-inch promotion in last month's MacBook Air deal coverage, but if you're in the market for a graduation gift or ready for a new device to accompany you during summer travel, the new $837 price offers additional savings. Please note, though, pricing has been volatile and Amazon has been updating discounts throughout the day.
